definition: very close/no gap between them/continuously/unbroken/hard to separate/indistinguishable
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between

sentences.english: What makes them want to be intimate?
Parents should work together as efficiently as two bookends.
sentences.chinese: 父母亲应合作无间，如同两个书档使书稳立不摇。

sentences.english: The cure for triangulation is trust and intimacy.
sentences.chinese: 互相信任与亲密无间是根治第三方卷入的良方。

sentences.english: They conversed with the familiarity of a long-established acquaintance.
sentences.chinese: 他们俨然如老相识一样亲密无间地攀谈了。

sentences.english: I think infernal affairs his best film yet.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得《无间道》是他最好的电影。

sentences.english: If you love puzzle-solving, I bet you will love Infernal Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 如果你爱益智解题，我打赌你会爱上无间道。

sentences.english: I think Infernal Affairs is my favorite movie of his though.
sentences.chinese: 无间道》是我最喜欢的他的电影。

sentences.english: They were glad to find out that they spoke the same language and soon became buddy-buddy .
sentences.chinese: 他们很高兴地发现双方志趣相投，很快变得亲密无间。

sentences.english: True strength flows from a healthy body and mind working in harmory.
sentences.chinese: 真正的力量来自于健康身体和健康大脑的合作无间。

sentences.english: Izumi and I had a strictly compartmentalised yet totally intimate relationship.
sentences.chinese: 泉和我保持着一种泾渭分明却又亲密无间的关系。

sentences.english: We have always been able to supply these firms with their monthly requirements without interruption.
sentences.chinese: 我方始终能供给这些公司每月所需的数量，从无间断。

sentences.english: But in my opinion, Infernal Affairs is his best performance.
sentences.chinese: 我爱《无间道》里的他，那是我最喜欢的电影之一。

sentences.english: However, my favorite performance from him was in Infernal Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我最喜欢的他的表演是在《无间道》里。

sentences.english: We need to cooperate perfectly to win the game .
sentences.chinese: 我们需要赢得这个游戏就得合作无间。

sentences.english: Tight relationships with its suppliers foster innovation.
sentences.chinese: 与供应商的无间合作促使革新。

sentences.english: Life at the mansion was lavish and lascivious—a Puritan's ninth circle of hell.
sentences.chinese: 一位清教徒的无间炼狱却是他的生活写照。

definition: to make no distinction between what's one's own and what's another's (idiom)/to share everything/to be on very intimate terms
the hidden and the visible/that which can be seen and that which cannot/darkness and light/night and day/wisdom and ignorance/evil and good/the living and the dead/men and ghosts
Man and Heaven/celestial being
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
lit. seamless heavenly clothes (idiom)/fig. flawless
(fig.) specter
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
treacherous person/evil spirit
demonic/devil
unmoved/indifferent/unruffled by sentiment
to die out/to fade away/nirvana (Buddhism)
marvelous/wondrous
combined assault/to mount a joint attack
as the arm moves the finger (idiom)/freely and effortlessly/to have perfect command of
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
accommodating/(Buddhism) completely integrated
